item.title: Why I Switched Back to Github Pages from Blogger.com
item.description: Previously I used to blog on Github pages with Jekyll. After I discovered blogger.com, I thought I could improve my blogging experience with it. So I made the switch and these were my reasons. I couldn’t find a suitable Jekyll theme for my blog.

item.title: Top 10 Practical Reasons to Use Jekyll for your Site/Blog
item.description: I wanted to make a site but I could not decide which building platform to choose from, Wordpress or Jekyll? On one hand I had the incredible power of Wordpress and on the other hand my love for GitHub pages with Jekyll.
